title: 植物魔法盖亚召唤实体蹦服
txt_content:
QQ截图20191004134536.png (6.09 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-10-4 13:46 上传





好像是植物魔法实体蹦服的，具体日志下载地址：日志 （求助） 如果是的话，能不能用clearentity插件清掉实体,不清楚具体的实体名

replies.author: mohist
replies.txt_content:
使用修复版植物魔法1.7.10的250版本http://222.186.34.79:8080/%E6%A4 ... ania%20r1.8-250.jar

再把config文件夹中的forge文本两个 
   # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=true

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=true


设置true




file_1570170242000.jpg (244.04 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-10-4 14:24 上传

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
直接打开 forge 的清理错误实体吧

打开文件夹 config/ 中的文件 forge.cfg ，将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码
